why we can't change
http://www.fastcompany.com/video/why-change-is-so-hard-self-control-is-exhaustible

just a bit of addition to what he said. he only talks about the challenge we face but never explains how to overcome it. one obvious one would be to change slowly (but that has the risk of making it difficult to maintain the goal in sight)

the other is to get friends, spouses who are there to help and support in other ways without letting you succumb to your old habbits
